node.title: Always on Call: God's Purpose for a Professional Parent
node.description: OBJECTIVES 1. Acknowledge the importance that God places on the family circle & parental care of children at home. 2. Accepting the years of education you have and acknowledging God’s additional plan for your life in raising your children to be shining stars for Him. 3. Combine one’s professional passion & family life while remembering that the care of children is for time and eternity. Research on the positive aspects of caring for children will be presented.
